27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas narrated:"A man sought a mount from the Messenger of Allah who said: 'Indeed, I will let you ride on a she-camel's child.' So he said: 'O Messenger of Allah! What can ashe-camel's child do?' So the Messenger of Allah said: 'Are camels borne from other than she-camels?

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Joking
